solution_line_template: Claire's age now is {claire_age_in_two_years} - {years_from_now} = <<{claire_age_in_two_years}-{years_from_now}={claire_current_age}>>{claire_current_age} years old.

Being {jessica_age_difference} years older than Claire, Jessica is {claire_current_age} + {jessica_age_difference} = <<{jessica_age_difference}+{claire_current_age}={jessica_current_age}>>{jessica_current_age} years old.
